info.name: Arduino forum minimal (Simple Machines Forum)
info.description: Once again, getting rid of huge irritating margins and line heights, enlarging some mini-font-sizes and aligning unnessecary block-stacked elements.
info.additionalInfo: 26/1/2014 I reduced the content wrapper width to 900px for more density on post pages, as opposed to the tables listing topics, which are 90% wide.
